name: Homme - Portable domotics system
tagline: smart home server Portable domotics system
body:
Homme, is simple-to-use, low-cost portable domotics system aimed at bringing home automation to every house!

Entrepreneurial project that was presented at BET24 competition and "The Next big Idea" tv show.

Special thanks to Nuno Maia and BET(Bring Entrepreneurs Together)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m0uO5m31nnQ
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
